On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Gregory

 Williamsburg Ferry Terminal

⏲ 9:11 a.m. on Wednesday, March 26

What are you doing today?

We’re doing GPS observation for a mapping project. After Sandy, this area was flooded, so the MTA is looking to protect their underground structures from flooding again. This is part of that project.

What's your favorite part of the day?

The view. The view isn’t here on all of the days. I worked in this area like fifteen years ago. It was a dump area, no buildings, just homelessness, dirt and debris. Now look at it.

What are you doing tomorrow?

The same.
